name: BlackBerry 9650
description: The phone comes with a 2.44-inch display with a resolution of 360x480 pixels at a pixel density of 246 pixels per inch (ppi). BlackBerry Bold 9650 is powered by an one-core processor. The BlackBerry Bold 9650 runs BlackBerry OS 6 and is powered by a 1400mAh removable battery.

name: Samsung Galaxy A12
description: Samsung Galaxy A12 features a 6.5-inch HD+ TFT display. It is powered by an octa-core processor that, as per a report by GSMArena, could be the MediaTek Helio P35 SoC. The phone comes with up to 6GB of RAM and up to 128GB of storage, which is expandable via a microSD card (up to 1TB).

name: Apple iPhone 7
description: Apple iPhone 7 smartphone was launched in September 2016. The phone comes with a 4.70-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 750x1334 pixels at a pixel density of 326 pixels per inch (ppi) and an aspect ratio of 16:9. Apple iPhone 7 is powered by a 2.34GHz quad-core Apple A10 Fusion processor.
color: Jet Black, Black, Silver, Gold, Rose Gold, Red

name: Nokia C2 Tava
description: The phone comes with a 5.45-inch touchscreen display. Nokia C2 Tava comes with 2GB of RAM. The Nokia C2 Tava runs Android 10 and is powered by a 3000mAh battery. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Nokia C2 Tava on the rear packs an 8-megapixel primary camera and a second 2-megapixel camera.

name: Microsoft Lumia 650
description: Microsoft Lumia 650 smartphone was launched in February 2016. The phone comes with a 5.00-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 720x1280 pixels at a pixel density of 297 pixels per inch (ppi). Microsoft Lumia 650 is powered by a 1.3GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 212 processor. It comes with 1GB of RAM.

name: LG W11
description: The phone comes with a 6.52-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 720x1600 pixels and an aspect ratio of 20:9. LG W11 is powered by a 2GHz octa-core processor. It comes with 3GB of RAM. The LG W11 runs Android 10 and is powered by a 4000mAh battery.

name: Apple iPhone 12
description: The long-rumored flagship iPhone has 5G, flat sides, and an improved camera system. The iPhone 12 is the replacement for the baseline iPhone 11. It has a 6.1 OLED display using Apple's Super Retina XDR technology and supports 5G networks.

name: Motorola Razr 5G
description: With narrow dimensions, an effortless zero-gap hinge, and an ergonomically friendly fingerprint reader, razr 5G is super simple to flip open and use with just one hand. We fit 5G capability into a device that folds into half the size of other phones. Strap in for data speeds you didn't think were possible.
color: Polished Graphite, Blush Gold, Liquid Mercury

name: Google Pixel 4a
description: Design. Cute. That's the one-word answer to 'describe the Google Pixel 4a design'. It's one of the more compact Android smartphones you can get hold of these days, measuring 144 x 69.4 x 8.2mm, which makes it smaller than the Pixel 3a while boasting a bigger screen.

name: Samsung Galaxy S10
description: The Galaxy S10 packs in a 3400mAh battery and manages to deliver over one day of battery life. It sports a triple camera setup at the back onsisting of a 12-megapixel telephoto camera, 12-megapixel wide-angle camera and 16-megapixel ultra wide camera.
color: Prism White, Prism Black, Prism Green, Prism Blue, Canary Yellow, Flamingo Pink, Cardinal Red, Smoke Blue

name: BLU J5L
description: BLU J5L supports frequency bands GSM , HSPA , LTE. Official announcement date is October 2020. The device is working on an Android 10 (Go edition) with a Quad-core 1.4 GHz Cortex-A53 processor. BLU J5L has 32GB 1GB RAM of built-in memory. The main screen size is 5.0 inches, 68.9 cm2 with 720 x 1280 pixels, 16:9 ratio resolution. It has a 294 ppi density) ppi pixel density. The screen covers about 66.2% of the device's body. The result is quite good. For USA

name: Huawei P40
description: Huawei P40 Pro smartphone runs on Android v10 (Q) operating system. The phone is powered by Octa core (2.86 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 2.36 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 1.95 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A55) processor. It runs on the HiSilicon Kirin 990 5G Chipset. It has 8 GB RAM and 256 GB internal storage.
color: Silver Frost, Blush Gold, Deep Sea Blue, Ice White, Black

name: Huawei Mate 30
description: Huawei Mate 30 smartphone runs on Android v10 (Q) operating system. The phone is powered by Octa core (2.86 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 2.09 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 1.86 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A55) processor. It runs on the HiSilicon Kirin 990 Chipset. It has 8 GB RAM and 128 GB internal storage.
color: Black, Space Silver, Cosmic Purple, Emerald Green
